N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1727-3.7 - Resident employees

State Regulations
A housing company may assign apartments for resident
employees and their families if such assignments will provide for more
efficient operation of the project. The apartments to be assigned and the
rents, if any, to be charged shall be established by the company, subject to
the prior written approval of the division. Resident employees shall not be
subject to rental surcharges or annual income reviews. A resident employee's
apartment lease or agreement which provides for immediate vacating of the
apartment upon termination of employment for any reason whatsoever, shall be
executed by all resident employees. Notes
